problem.markdown:
1. When excitation frequency is equal to natural frequency of absorber, the main system amplitude is ?
() maximum (x) zero () None of these () half of maximum
2. The mass whose vibrations are to be kept minimum is called?
() Secondary Mass (x) Primary Mass () None of these () Absorber Mass
3. Tuned Mass Damper is essentially
() a 1DoF system with extra mass (x) a 2DoF system () a Complex pendulum () None of these
4. Without the absorber mass the number of natural frequencies in a TMD is
() 2 (x) 1 () 0 () none of these
5. TMD system has
() 1 Natural Frequency (x) 2 Natural Frequencies () ∞ Natural Frequencies () None of these
problem.p: 1. When excitation frequency is equal to natural frequency of absorber, the main system amplitude is ?
2. The mass whose vibrations are to be kept minimum is called?
4. Without the absorber mass the number of natural frequencies in a TMD is
